https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uOAOoW3eCHAHfwSc9xspYd5fHd4.jpg A live Cirque du Soleil performance featuring remixed music, visuals, musicians, singers, and dancers. Delirium is the quest for balance in a world increasingly out of sync with reality. Delirium is an urban tale, a mix of music, dance, theater, and multimedia. Cirque du Soleil: Delirium
